title: Diana is left out.
body: Does anyone agree that Riot should make a new Diana skins? If you guys think so respond to this and maybe they will see it and think about it.

replies.body: {{champion:238}}
just do project : zed and blood moon diana legendary skins and riot employees are rich.
XD haha good idea
I think project : zed is a good idea KAPPA, JUST GOT TEASED
BloodMoon Diana or Riot
Easy give her a red chroma for her base skin "blood moon diana" :)

{{champion:114}} wtb skins
last one was 2012
All of her skins just got a vo though lol

Keeping a character up to standards of the rest of the game after it got nothing for 3 years is not equal to real content for that character. Just what was necessary. I just want one skin on the champion I have put hundreds of games into and will probably put hundreds more have a skin  that has different particle effects or at LEAST a backing animation.
Careful what you wish for. The new riven skin was a massive miss imo the blitz skin is too imo.... lol

I honestly think that riven skin has some amazing animation particles. But the colors of the skin as a whole are pretty bland.
I would buy that skin if i was a riven player. 8/10

> [{quoted}](name=Intronile,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=0007000100010000,timestamp=2015-08-07T17:35:22.409+0000)
>
> Careful what you wish for. The new riven skin was a massive miss imo the blitz skin is too imo.... lol

Better to have a poor skin than no skin. It's not like you have to buy a skin you don't like.
That argument is totally invalid. Have you seen the in-game model? Lol.
It wasn't an argument? I was stating a fact... A buncha work just went into her vo and rework. I like the in game model. o.o It's a pretty massive change from her original design.
So now lets get some skins for the new model!
So much this^

Agreed! 
Im currently working on a voidborn Diana skin - think this could work? 

http://i.imgur.com/HoaNwVL.png

That looks great. I think people are think of the blood noon ideas cause she has a lot to do with that idea. XD I think this could work but we as a community would have to speak with RIOT to consider it and have it make sense with her character.
Needs more purple. ;)

Enough? ;)

http://i.imgur.com/6kxBpGo.png

> [{quoted}](name=Equifox,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=000f00010000,timestamp=2015-08-07T17:39:18.858+0000)

>

Ohhhhhhhhhh....even better.
Sexy!

This is freaking SICK. Very well done
{{champion:69}} {{item:3151}}

{{champion:2}} we still don't have a techno Viking skin
{{champion:59}} the prince needs some new threads

Olaf already has a techno viking dance, plus, what would that skin be like?  Olaf without a shirt?

But I completely agree, what skins he does have are ass.  Extremely ass.

He might be a candidate for the worst legendary in the game as well.

I also agree. I love Diana and she is one of my mains and I own both of her skins and I know Lunar Goddess is fairly recent, but they are just both really lackluster. I'm hoping for Blood Moon or Neon Strike Diana.
NEON STRIKE DIANA WHERE CAN I FIND THE CONCEPT ART I DIDNT EVEN KNOW I NEEDED THIS UNTIL NOW

> [{quoted}](name=TheFirstGokun,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-08-06T20:23:16.681+0000)
>
> NEON STRIKE DIANA WHERE CAN I FIND THE CONCEPT ART I DIDNT EVEN KNOW I NEEDED THIS UNTIL NOW

There actually is none that I'm aware of. It's just an idea I thought of awhile back... I'm also no artist so I can't draw it even if I wanted to haha. But it seems like something that would fit her and all the colors would be pretty :) haha

No need to make a poll for this. ANytime anyone makes something like this, a bunch of fanboys will just vote yes.
Truth be told.
Now the very same fanboys will downvote this into oblivion, and ignore the other champs which need skins.

I'm not disagreeing with you but, Diana really could use another skin. She has got a lot of game recently cause of how she played in the new meta. A skin for her right now would really get her going again. Other champs will get that chance just like Diana should now.

diana jungle is played a lot.
WW needs a skin, talon needs a skin, urgot needs a skin, taric needs one, poppy needs one, etc.

PROJECT: {{champion:131}} 

Looks like you got your wish op.
As great as it seems, I don't think they will be making a Project Diana skin. Of they do then great, but I think it is a really low chance.

And reworked. Her kit is really weird, and many agree. http://www.newsoflegends.com/index.php/the-rework-forge-issue-3-how-to-make-diana-a-fun-competitive-assassin-23793/ Here's a very good article about it. But she shouldn't be an AP/Fighter as League of Legends has her right now, she should be an AP assassin, but they should keep her Q.

And yes she needs more skins.

I read this and it seems very viable. I thought of any possible combos you can do with this and it seemed to play fine. Chasing would be easier accept for maybe LeBlanc. Thanks for sharing this article.

> [{quoted}](name=0matthos0,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=00110001,timestamp=2015-08-19T05:43:54.340+0000)
>
> I read this and it seems very viable. I thought of any possible combos you can do with this and it seemed to play fine. Chasing would be easier accept for maybe LeBlanc. Thanks for sharing this article.

You're welcome. I mean I love Diana's kit now, but well... the article says it all.
No.

> [{quoted}](name=Slampiece Hawke,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2015-08-13T08:28:58.226+0000)
>
> No.

Yes.
A chroma would be better imo. That or a Bilgewater/water/fire themed Diana.
A new chroma?  Cause I'd really waste money just to have her be a different color.  How about a legit new skin?

Not to hate on Diana players, but this is still a "Rito, how dare you not give X champion a new skin?" thread.

{{champion:26}} All in good time.
{{champion:60}}  feeling all your pain.

> [{quoted}](name=Vekkna,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-06T21:48:58.587+0000)
>
> {{champion:60}}  feeling all your pain.

She just got Blood Moon Elise like 4 months ago lol

It was like 8 months ago. But it doesn't matter when she got it because Elise and Diana still only have 2 skins. Ekko will have the same number of skins in 3 months that Diana and Elise have gotten in 3 years.
She just got a gorgeous red one a month or so ago.

Not sure which one you're talking about? Blood Moon? The spiders and spell effects on that one are incredible, but the skin itself is fugly (taste is relative).

My point is only that she has exactly 2 skins available for sale just like Diana, and the champs were released around the same time 3 years ago.
Way more than a month ago but yeah it was pretty recent.
Seems like there are more deserving champs, just because Riven is showered in skins doesn't mean everyone should be.

> [{quoted}](name=ThatNinjaGuy,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=P7GO3Vch,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-08-07T04:05:11.123+0000)
>
> Seems like there are more deserving champs, just because Riven is showered in skins doesn't mean everyone should be.

I would have thought everyone deserved to be showered in skins.
